New Records: Anthony Davis scored 37 points, 9 rebounds, and 4 assists in the game.
Cade Cunningham recorded a triple-double with 17 points, 11 rebounds, and 11 assists.
Jaden Ivey scored 26 points, 4 rebounds, and 4 assists in the win.
Key Match Events: The Pistons started strong, leading 15-7 after five minutes.
The Lakers' defense was strong in the third quarter, limiting the Pistons to 16 points.
Cade Cunningham, Ron Holland II, and Jaden Ivey made key plays in the fourth quarter to secure the win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pistons improved their record to 3-5 with the win.
The Lakers dropped to 4-3 with the loss on the road.
